mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, password, role.role_id as role_id, role.role_name as role_name, role.permission as permission, sex, phone, email, birthday, age, expire from user inner join role on user.role_id = role.role_id

select user_id, user_name, password, role.role_id, role.role_name, role.permission, sex, phone, email, birthday, age, expire from user inner join role on user.role_id = role.role_id where user_id = #{userId}
